sentences.sContent: None of us should ever underestimate the degree of difficulty women face in career advancement.
sentences.sCn: 我们谁都不应低估妇女在职业发展中所面临的困难程度。

remMethod.val: under(低于…)+estimate(估计)→估计少了→低估

trans.tranOther: to think or guess that something is smaller, cheaper, easier etc than it really is
